timeline.author: jmthibault79

timeline.bodyText: logged in UserServiceImpl.setBypasstimeWithRetries() which is called by each of the setXYZBypassTime()
timeline.author: jmthibault79

timeline.bodyText: Could remove this check entirely?  I decided not to change existing behavior
timeline.author: jmthibault79

replies.bodyText: Yeah, if this user isn't found, we'll probably get an NPE (or worse) in setBypassTimeWithRetries. That would be good to verify in the debugger.
replies.author: jaycarlton

timeline.bodyText: I missed the previous value in my original implementation. Let's keep these and one of us can pass the previous time as an additional Optional arg to fireAdministrativeBypassTime(). You can just do a TODO or go ahead and pipe that in if you don't mind.
timeline.author: jaycarlton

timeline.message: Add previousBypassTime to set bypass calls

timeline.bodyText: Can you please make sure the order matches other auditor functions? I believe it's usually previous then new. IJ has a Change Signature refactoring for that. Also please rename bypassTime to newBypassTime to make it foolproof.
timeline.author: jaycarlton
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -15,7 +15,10 @@ void fireUpdateDataAccessAction(
       Agent agent);
 
   void fireAdministrativeBypassTime(
-      long userId, BypassTimeTargetProperty bypassTimeTargetProperty, Optional<Instant> bypassTime);
+      long userId,
+      BypassTimeTargetProperty bypassTimeTargetProperty,
+      Optional<Instant> bypassTime,

timeline.message:
Deprecate userService.logAdminUserAction/logAdminWorkspaceAction
- remove two calls where they have replacements

Deprecate DB and DAO themselves
Add previousBypassTime to set bypass calls
